contact: If you want to get in touch, please email me at farichenswrites@gmail.com, message me on my LinkedIn, or use the contact form below.
heading: Frances Richens
contact_text: If you want to get in touch, please email me at frances.a.richens@gmail.com or use the contact form below.
about:
I am a writer and communications specialist with over 10 years of experience in journalism, editing, communications and marketing. I specialise in arts and culture, and food and drink.

Before going freelance, I held senior editorial and communications positions within B2B and consumer publications, as well as nonprofit arts organisations. I have been published in The Guardian, Daily Telegraph, ArtsProfessional, Time Out and Mouth London.

Alongside my freelance writing, I offer services in communications and grant writing to artists and arts organisations. I have worked with Quarantine, Proforma, Cultural Style Week, Meek-Eaton Black Archives Research Center and Museum, and GAMAE International. 

This website showcases a select portfolio of my journalistic and marketing writing.
